newsitem.title: USA: Russ Hogg joins Micrografx as chairman.
newsitem.headline: Russ Hogg joins Micrografx as chairman.

text.p: Micrografx Inc said Thursday that Russ Hogg, former president of MasterCard International, has been elected to the company's board of directors and will serve as chairman.
Hogg replaces Joe Kupke, who has served as interim chairman since December 1996, as chairman and as a member of the board.
Micrografx also said it has hired Aline Parrish as vice president corporate communications reporting to president and chief executive officer Doug Richard.
Parrish directs the company's public relations and investor relations activities, as well outside media and agency/vendor relationships.
